channel.title: business on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in business on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Come dream with me
item.description: What does our country really need? We need to make sure every citizen gets enough to eat, clothe themselves and opportunity to enrich themselves using good quality education, and employment.

item.title: Introduction to the Indian Caste System
My first Entrepreneurship workshop
item.description: Yesterday I was in Bremen for my first Entrepreneurship workshop. I had heard of them ever since my undergrad but I was never that interested in it back then.
